content.prompt: Based on the outcome of the polls, which of the following is likely true about questions that use the agree-disagree format?

choices.label: Questions that use the agree-disagree format increase the percentage of respondents who agree with the primary statement.
Questions that use the agree-disagree format create confusion about what is being asked.
Questions that use the agree-disagree format reduce support for the public policy that is being surveyed.
Questions that use the agree-disagree promote considerations of other perspectives.

skill.text: Skill 3.C: Explain patterns and trends in data to draw conclusions.
